solution_line_template: Bella needs a total of {beads_per_bracelet} beads x {num_friends} friends = <<{beads_per_bracelet}*{num_friends}={total_beads_needed}>>{total_beads_needed} beads.
She needs {total_beads_needed} beads – {beads_has} beads = <<{total_beads_needed}-{beads_has}={beads_needed_more}>>{beads_needed_more} more beads.
